solution_line_template: There were {dogs_with_3_legs} * {paws_per_3_leg_dog} = <<{dogs_with_3_legs}*{paws_per_3_leg_dog}={paws_from_3_leg_dogs}>>{paws_from_3_leg_dogs} paws on dogs with 3 legs.
At {nails_per_paw} nails per paw, she trimmed {total_nails_trimmed} / {nails_per_paw} = <<{total_nails_trimmed}/{nails_per_paw}={total_paws_trimmed}>>{total_paws_trimmed} paws.
She worked on N = {paws_on_4_leg_dogs} / {paws_per_4_leg_dog} = <<{paws_on_4_leg_dogs}/{paws_per_4_leg_dog}={dogs_with_4_legs}>>{dogs_with_4_legs} dogs with 4 legs.
